column1: 0932|9.32|He said he couldn't say for certain of course
column2: but that he rather thought he was. Anyhow
column3: if he wasn't the 11.5 for Kingston
column4: he said he was pretty confident he was the 9.32 for Virginia Water
column5: or the 10 a.m. express for the Isle of Wight
column7: and we should all know when we got there.

column1: 0932|nine-thirty-two|Sandy barely made the nine-thirty-two and found a seat in no-smoking. She'd been looking forward to this visit with Lisbeth. They hadn't seen each other in months
column3: when Sandy had returned from Jamaica. And on that day Sandy was sporting a full-blown herpes virus on her lower lip.
